ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Funding to support this research was provided by the National Botanic Garden of Wales and a bequest from Dr Quentin Kay. L.J. and A.L. were supported by Knowledge Economy Skills Scholarships (KESS2), part funded by the Welsh Government’s European Social Fund (ESF). Thank you to beekeepers throughout the UK for generously providing honey samples. Thank you to Adam Leitch for making A.S.C. Deans’ 1958 NDB thesis available to us.
